Room.Name: The Southern Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along the southern path around the Barbarian Pits.
Room.LongDescription: The Southern Path brings you around towards the low-level training grounds, located to the west. In order to advance as a barbarian, you must prove yourself to the barbarian leaders by defeating another who is one level greater than you. Only then will you be allowed to advance to the next level. The path circles back toward the entrance to the north and heads towards the southern border to the south.
